mapper.select: select a.id,case a.type when 10 then "规划招商资产" end as type,area,a.name,address,details,addArr,longitude,latitude,image,if(video is null,'',video ) as video,if(vRaddress is null,'',vRaddress ) as vRaddress from t_product a left join t_future_product b on a.obj_id=b.id where a.type=10 and b.village = #{village}
